ensemble_method.quote: Ensembled everything with different seeds (simple average of ~40 models)

prediction_averaging.quote: Used XGB, LGBM, Catboost models with different preprocessing strategies, feature sets, hyperparameters. Ensembled everything with different seeds (simple average of ~40 models). XGB was always the best model for me

libraries.quote: Used XGB, LGBM, Catboost models with different preprocessing strategies

aggregation_features.quote: Created ~6000 features: aggregations, diff(1 to 5), moving average and statistics

time_series_features.quote: Created ~6000 features: aggregations, diff(1 to 5), moving average and statistics, lags divisions, trends

data_denoising.quote: Created ~6000 features: aggregations, diff(1 to 5), moving average and statistics, lags divisions, trends, many interactions among the top 100 features, KMeans, PCA etc.

feature_selection_method.quote: Selected features by permutation importances on the validation set (ended up with ~5 different features sets with ~650 to ~1400 features)
